news.title: Researchers dispute lawmaker’s allegation that NOAA rushed climate study
news.summary: Scientists are disputing a prominent Republican congressman’s claims that federal climate researchers rushed a study to publication in order to advance the Obama administration’s policies.

news.title: Updated NOAA temperature record shows little global warming slowdown
